sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_d2f37cb42f3b55901dc093acf699b6f1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes>8f0ec3492c5f441781f1f44f36351242</includes><macroponent display_value="Dashboard">b701b8f02f3b55901dc093acf699b65b</macroponent><name>filter data visualizations with OOTB filters</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    api.setState('parFilters', ({
        currentValue
    }) => {
        const {
            payload: {
                appliedFilters
            }
        } = event;
        let filter = imports['global.mergePARFilters']()(currentValue, appliedFilters);//The visualization components are built to listen to filter events.
        return filter;
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jdsingh</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-13 13:32:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>d2f37cb42f3b55901dc093acf699b6f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>filter data visualizations with OOTB filters</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d2f37cb42f3b55901dc093acf699b6f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jdsingh</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-13 13:32:48</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_a564fcf42f3b55901dc093acf699b6f8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes>8f0ec3492c5f441781f1f44f36351242</includes><macroponent display_value="Dashboard">b701b8f02f3b55901dc093acf699b65b</macroponent><name>filter with encoded query</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    //set text filter presence
    api.setState("textFilterPresence", api.state.shortDescription ? 'presence-available-outline' : null);

    const appliedFilters = [{
        "order": 0,
        "filterId": "", //We can leave this empty
        "type": "query",
        "label": "Short Description",
        "apply_to": [
            "incident" //More tables can be added here
        ],
        "encoded_query": api.state.shortDescription ? `short_descriptionLIKE${api.state.shortDescription}` : null, //If you have applied a default filter on your visualization component then add that here instead of null.
        "extraValues": {},
        "include_unmatched_or_empty": false
    }];

    const processedFilter = imports['global.mergePARFilters']()(api.state.parFilters, appliedFilters);
    api.setState("parFilters", processedFilter);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jdsingh</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-13 13:34:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>a564fcf42f3b55901dc093acf699b6f8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>filter with encoded query</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a564fcf42f3b55901dc093acf699b6f8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jdsingh</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-13 13:43:51</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
